eu.id3.face

Class FaceAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.id3.face.FaceAnalyser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class FaceAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a FaceAnalyser object of the Face module.
    See Also:

      • getHandle

        public long getHandle()
        Gets the native handle.
        Returns:
        The native handle.

      • getExpressionSensibility

        public int getExpressionSensibility()
                             throws FaceException
        Gets the sensibility of the expression classifier. The higher the value, the more sensitive the algorithm will be, meaning that it will be less likely to estimate neutral expression out of the detected face.
        Returns:
        Sensibility of the expression classifier. The higher the value, the more sensitive the algorithm will be, meaning that it will be less likely to estimate neutral expression out of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • setExpressionSensibility

        public void setExpressionSensibility(int expressionSensibility)
                              throws FaceException
        Sets the sensibility of the expression classifier. The higher the value, the more sensitive the algorithm will be, meaning that it will be less likely to estimate neutral expression out of the detected face.
        Parameters:
        expressionSensibility - Sensibility of the expression classifier. The higher the value, the more sensitive the algorithm will be, meaning that it will be less likely to estimate neutral expression out of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeAge

        public int computeAge(Image image,
                      DetectedFace detectedFace)
               throws FaceException
        Computes the age of a detected face.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Estimated age of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeAttributes

        public FaceAttributes computeAttributes(Image image,
                                        DetectedFace detectedFace)
                                 throws FaceException
        Computes the attributes of a detected face.
        Parameters:

        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Estimated attributes of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeBackgroundUniformity

        public BackgroundUniformity computeBackgroundUniformity(Image image,
                                                        DetectedFace detectedFace)
                                                 throws FaceException
        Computes the background uniformity behind a detected face. This function must be used for a portrait image with only one face in it. A high uniformity score means that the background is uniform.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Estimated background uniformity. Both color and texture scores are in the range [0:100]. The minimum recommended thresholds are respectively 80 for color and 80 for texture.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeExpression

        public FaceExpression computeExpression(Image image,
                                        DetectedFace detectedFace)
                                 throws FaceException
        Computes the expression of a detected face.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Estimated expression of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeEyeGaze

        public EyeGaze computeEyeGaze(Image image,
                              DetectedFace detectedFace,
                              PointList landmarks)
                       throws FaceException
        Computes the eye gaze of a detected face.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        landmarks - Estimated landmarks of the detected face. Must be computed with the face analyser.
        Returns:
        Estimated gaze of left and right eyes of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeEyeOpenness

        public int[] computeEyeOpenness(Image image,
                                DetectedFace detectedFace,
                                PointList landmarks)
                         throws FaceException
        Computes the eye openness of a detected face. The minimum recommanded value for is 90.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        landmarks - Estimated landmarks of the detected face. Must be computed with the face analyser.
        Returns:
        Estimated openness scores of left and right eyes of the detected face in this order.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeEyeRedness

        public int[] computeEyeRedness(Image image,
                               DetectedFace detectedFace,
                               PointList landmarks)
                        throws FaceException
        Computes the eye redness of a detected face. The maximum recommanded value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is 10.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        landmarks - Estimated landmarks of the detected face. Must be computed with the face analyser.
        Returns:
        Estimated redness scores of left and right eyes of the detected face in this order.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeGeometricAttributes

        public GeometricAttributes computeGeometricAttributes(Image image,
                                                      DetectedFace detectedFace,
                                                      PointList landmarks)
                                               throws FaceException
        Computes the geometric attributes of a detected face. This function must be used for a portrait image with only one face in it.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        landmarks - Estimated landmarks of the detected face. Must be computed with the face analyser.
        Returns:
        Estimated geometric attributes of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • computeGlassesAttributes

        public GlassesAttributes computeGlassesAttributes(Image image,
                                                  DetectedFace detectedFace,
                                                  PointList landmarks)
                                           throws FaceException
        Computes the glasses attributes of a detected face. This function must be used for a portrait image with only one face in it.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        landmarks - Estimated landmarks of the detected face. Must be computed with the face analyser.
        Returns:
        Estimated glasses attributes of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

        Parameters:

        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        landmarks - Estimated landmarks of the detected face. Must be computed with the face analyser.

      • detectFaceMask

        public int detectFaceMask(Image image,
                          DetectedFace detectedFace)
                   throws FaceException
        Detects the presence of a face mask on a detected face. A high score means that there is a high chance that the person is wearing a mask. The minimum recommended threshold is 15.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Face mask presence score of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • detectOcclusions

        public FaceOcclusionScores detectOcclusions(Image image,
                                            DetectedFace detectedFace)
                                     throws FaceException
        Detects the presence of occlusions on top of a detected face.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image to process.
        detectedFace - Detected face to process.
        Returns:
        Occlusion scores of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.
